name: .EIO File Extension
summary: Learn about .EIO files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: File created by Evermore Integrated Office, an office suite similar to Microsoft Office; contains document formatting features such as text alignment, font settings, image insertion, and organization charts; holds a text document, worksheet, presentation, or blank binder; similar to a .DOCX, .PPTX, or .XLSX file.

content: Select File → New and select one of the Binder options.
Select File → Save (or Save As...) or click the floppy disk icon in the top-left of the window above File.
In the "Save As" dialog box, choose your save location, name your file, select the EIO extension in the "Save as type:" drop down menu and click Save.
EIO files can also be easily saved as a Microsoft Word, PowerPoint, or Excel document in the "Save as type:" drop down menu.
NOTE: Yozosoft was formerly known as Evermore Software. They changed their name to Yozosoft in 2010. The Evermore Integrated Office program also became Yozo Office.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
